attributes.review: This app is horrendous. Upon installing it my phone was immediately afflicted with virus after virus. As if this wasnâ€™t enough my sister saw the app and suddenly began saying â€œYee hawâ€ and caring about horses and Jesus. Our beloved Trump would never, of course, intend for this to happen to me, a homosexual male in the United States of America. Which, as we all know, is the most free country in the entire world (even though some might say as many as seventeen countries outrank the USA in freedom and equality). The fact of the matter is that our dear president has truly failed our country in providing a safe and legitimate app to praise him. Hallowed be our father, Donald Trump, and the son, Barron Trump, and the Holy Spirit, Melania Trump, but not hallowed be the app with which we worship.

attributes.review:
So basically my problems with this app began when Donald Trump tried to ban Muslims from entering the United States. Very racist and xenophobic, I did not like that at all. I continued to have issues when during his 2016 campaign he promised to build a wall along the southern border. This was an awful idea as it would be amazingly expensive solution to a problem that does not exist. 1. Immigrants help our country, not hurt it and 2. Most would still enter through legal border crossing stations as they have been doing for years. 

I can go on and on about how this man is racist, sexist, and also a rapist but the people who have their eyes open already know this. This app is garbage and needs to be removed.
attributes.title: NEEDS TO BE DELETED
